item.description:
Mark your calendars now for the next WBOA Evening Gathering, Wednesday Februray 8th at Pintu's Indian Restaurant in West Springfield.

We're changing things up this time and plan a family-style meal and a little round-robin between courses. We'll all share a fabulous array of dishes, loved by fans of Indian food and newbies alike. Between courses, we'll all get a chance to change seats and network with a fresh set of dining partners.

These dinners are always a fun way to get to know WBOA members outside our regular breakfast meetings. Please feel free to bring a guest or colleague.

Our three-course dinner will include appetizers, several entrees and dessert. Total price including tax and tip will be $27. Cash bar.

Informal networking begins at 5:30, dinner at 6:30. Please RSVP by Monday, February 6 on our MeetUp site. If you have any questions, please contact Amy Woolf at amysrq@gmail.com.

Appetizers: Assorted Pakoras - Florets of cauliflower, potatoes, onion, & paneer deep-fried in chickpea flour batter

Entrees: Chicken Tikka Masala - bar-b-que chicken cooked in a special fresh creamy tomato sauce with a variety of herbs

Mixed Vegetable Jhalfraze - a variety of vegetables sauteed & simmered gently in a makhani butter sauce

Beef Boti Kebab - skewered beef marinated in herbs and spices

Saag Paneer - cubes of homemade cheese cooked in a fresh creamed spinach gravy Naan bread Dessert
item.name: February Evening Social Event- Pintu's Indian Palace
